title: Lonely Planet names the best cities to visit in 2020
text:
Lonely Planet has released its 15th annual list of best places to visit, which includes exotic lands such as ... Washington, DC?

Indeed, the US capital is No. 2 on the travel resource's ranking of top cities to visit in 2020, because, according to Lonely Planet, "the excitement of the year's presidential election" ties into the city's celebration of the 100th anniversary of the 19th amendment, which gave women the right to vote.

Australian and US flags on the Eisenhower Building for Australian PM Scott Morrison's visit in Washington DC, last month. AAP

Washington will have new museum exhibits, new trees and a refreshed waterfront, all for your visiting pleasure. Here are the other places the made the global list:

1. Salzburg, Austria

The alpine city's Salzburg Festival is turning 100 (Lonely Planet likes to honour centennials) with special concerts, plays and readings.
description: Washington will have new museum exhibits, new trees and a refreshed waterfront, all for your visiting pleasure. (Lonely Planet likes to honour centennials).
